p.style: box-sizing: border-box; transition: all 400ms ease 0s; margin: 0px auto; line-height: 1.1; padding: 12.5px; max-width: 1200px; text-align: left;
p.span: Governor Whitmer announced EO 2020-42 onApril 9, 2020 in response to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.EO 2020-42extendsthe statewide'Stay Home, Stay Safe' initiativethrough April 30, 2020 and significantly restricts people from leaving their homes or gathering in public.EO 2020-42goes hand-in-hand with EO 2020-35 which closed all schools in Michigan for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. Check out the COVID-19 menu above for additionalinformation about these executive orders and theireffect on EAPS students and families.

strong.span: Online Learning Portals: Webster | Lemmer/Soo Hill | EUE

p.span: Welcome to our website the very best place to learn about the Escanaba Area Public School District and its many offerings. Use the navigation menu above to browse the entire site. Scroll down to access Quick Links to our most popular resources.

br.br: Feedback is always appreciated and helps us to provide information our visitors are looking for. Please feel free to send your comments viae-mail.

p.span:
The Board of Education meeting scheduled for Monday, April 20th at 6:00 PM atEscanaba Upper ElementarySchoolhas been canceled.
Please contactMarlene Valleyat (906) 786-5411 or bye-mailfor additional information.
